scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--trace-warnings PUBLIC_URL=$PREFIX_PATH/assets/; parcel build resources/index.js resources/images/** --dist-dir public --public-url $PUBLIC_URL && parcel build resources/admin.js --dist-dir public --public-url $PUBLIC_URL
scripts.watch: export NODE_OPTIONS=--trace-warnings; parcel watch resources/index.js resources/admin.js --dist-dir public
scripts.version: yarn version-dune && yarn version-opam && yarn version-opam-lock && yarn version-pool
scripts.version-pool: sed "s/^let to_string = ".*"/let to_string = \"${npm_package_version}\"/g" ./pool/version/version.ml > /tmp/version.ml && cat /tmp/version.ml > ./pool/version/version.ml && git add ./pool/version/version.ml
